product_overview: Edu51Five is a modern academic portal designed for BUBT Intake-51 Section-5 students that centralizes course information, study materials, semester progress tracking, and administrative management in a responsive, user-friendly web application.
core_goals: Provide students with a centralized dashboard to access courses, sections, and study materials.
Enable administrators to efficiently manage courses, upload materials, and post notices.
Deliver real-time semester progress tracking including phases and upcoming milestones.
Offer a seamless and responsive user interface adaptable to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Support integration with external storage such as Google Drive for smart file delivery and previewing.
Ensure data persistence and management via Supabase backend with secure and robust CRUD operations.
key_features: Student Dashboard displaying courses, intakes, and section details.
Admin Dashboard with modal workflows for adding and managing courses, materials, and notices.
Semester Tracker showing live progress bar, timeline, countdowns, and phase information with a dedicated full-screen view.
Exam Materials Dashboard providing a smart and centralized resource hub.
Reusable PDF Viewer modal supporting fullscreen and mobile preview for PDFs and Google Drive files.
Global two-notice system supporting welcome messages and exam routine images with localStorage fallback and Supabase persistence.
Comprehensive course and file search and filter capabilities.
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS featuring animated progress bars and milestone indicators.
user_flow_summary: Students log in and access the Student Dashboard to browse courses and materials.
Users view semester progress and next milestones via the Semester Tracker section.
Admins access the Admin Dashboard via authentication to manage courses and upload materials through modal forms.
Users interact with notices displayed globally, with persistence across sessions.
Exam materials can be previewed in the PDF Viewer modal or accessed via embedded Google Drive links.
Users search and filter courses and files to quickly locate resources.
The application maintains state routing between views (home, section, course, semester, admin, exam materials) in a single-page app experience.
validation_criteria: Successful CRUD operations with Supabase for courses, materials, and notices.
Responsive UI rendering correctly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Correct display and live updating of semester progress and milestone countdowns.
PDF Viewer modal correctly previews files from local storage and Google Drive with full functionality.
Admin workflows for adding courses and uploading materials trigger appropriate database updates and UI refreshes.
Global notices are displayed and persist reliably using Supabase and localStorage fallback.
Search and filter functionalities accurately return relevant courses and materials.
Navigation within the single-page app is smooth, with the correct view state updates and data loading.
